texts.name: Aran
texts.biography: Through her gentle demeanor and steadfast support, Aran fosters a sense of belonging among its inhabitants. Yet beneath her gentle exterior lies a steely resolve; Aran is not one to shy away from wielding her power to crush the enemies of her people, ensuring the safety and prosperity of those under her care.
